segment.source: DaRT requires thorough planning before you deploy it or use its features.
segment.target: DaRT requires thorough planning before you deploy it or use its features.

segment.source: If you are new to this product, we recommend that you read the documentation carefully.
segment.target: If you are new to this product, we recommend that you read the documentation carefully.

segment.source: Before you deploy the product to a production environment, we also recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test network environment.
segment.target: Before you deploy the product to a production environment, we also recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test network environment.

segment.source: You might also consider taking a class about relevant technologies.
segment.target: You might also consider taking a class about relevant technologies.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft training opportunities, see the Microsoft Training Overview at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=80347.
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft training opportunities, see the Microsoft Training Overview at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=80347.

segment.source: This section provides general information for administrators who are evaluating and using Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7.
segment.target: This section provides general information for administrators who are evaluating and using Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: A downloadable version of this document and the DaRT 7 Evaluation Guide can be downloaded from http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232274.
segment.target: A downloadable version of this document and the DaRT 7 Evaluation Guide can be downloaded from http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232274.
